#include <iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int T,N,fp,a,b,i,p,rt,j;
	
	//cin>>T;
	//while(T--)
	{a=0;b=1;fp=2;
	cin>>N;
	for(i=1;i<N;i++)
		{
			do{
			p=1;
			a=b;
			b=fp;
			fp=a+b;
			rt=sqrt(fp);
			for(j=2;j<=rt;j++)	
				{
					if(fp%j==0) {p=0;break;}
				}
			}while(p!=1);
		}
	cout<<fp<<endl;
	}// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
